participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

sai_read_hrs_wk_y.Description: About how many hours per WEEK do you read on your own in your free time? (including online blogs, news, fiction, and non-fiction books etc) | 0=Less than 1 hour; 1=1 hours or more but less than 2 hours ; 2=2 hours or more but less than 3 hours ; 3=3 hours or more but less than 4 hours ; 4=4 hours or more but less than 5 hours ; 5 5 hours or more but less than 6 hours ; 6=6 hours or more but less than 8 hours ; 7=8 hours or more but less than 12 hours ; 8=12 hours or more but less than 18 hours; 9=18 hours or more but less than 24 hours ; 10=24 hours or more but less than 36 hours ; 11=36 hours or more but less than 72 hours ; 12=More than 72 hours ; 999=Don't know

Levels.1: 1 hours or more but less than 2 hours
Levels.2: 2 hours or more but less than 3 hours
Levels.3: 3 hours or more but less than 4 hours
Levels.4: 4 hours or more but less than 5 hours
Levels.6: 6 hours or more but less than 8 hours
Levels.7: 8 hours or more but less than 12 hours
Levels.8: 12 hours or more but less than 18 hours
Levels.9: 18 hours or more but less than 24 hours
Levels.10: 24 hours or more but less than 36 hours
Levels.11: 36 hours or more but less than 72 hours

sai_readmusic_admin_y.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination

sai_lmusic_y.Description: Do you enjoy listening to music? | 1=Yes ; 0,No

sai_lmusic_feel_y.Description: Do you listen to music to change the way you feel? | 0=Never ; 1=Sometimes ; 2=Usually ; 3=Always

sai_lmusic_hrs_day_y.Description: About how many hours per DAY do you listen to music? | 0=less than 1 hour ; 1=1 hour or more but less than 2 hours ; 2=2 hours or more but less than 3 hours ; 3=3 hours or more but less than 4 hours ; 4=4 hours or more but less than 5 hours ; 5=5 hours or more but less than 6 hours ; 6=6 hours or more but less than 7 hours ; 7=7 hours or more but less than 8 hours ; 8=More than 8 hours ; 999=Don't Know

Levels.1: 1 hour or more but less than 2 hours
Levels.2: 2 hours or more but less than 3 hours
Levels.3: 3 hours or more but less than 4 hours
Levels.4: 4 hours or more but less than 5 hours
Levels.5: 5 hours or more but less than 6 hours
Levels.6: 6 hours or more but less than 7 hours
Levels.7: 7 hours or more but less than 8 hours

sai_lmusic_studying_y.Description: Do you listen to music while you're studying? | 0=Never ; 1=Sometimes ; 2=Usually ; 3=Always

sai_read_y.Description: Do you read in your free time? (including online blogs, news, fiction, and non-fiction books etc...) | 1=Yes ; 0=No
